title: [APP] Android app to adjust sound volumes of any windows application (inc. Skype/TS) from your phone
body:
Hi guys,

One day I got sick and tired of always alt-tabbing to adjust the Skype/Teamspeak sound volume in Windows' sound mixer, either the game is too loud, or a friend I'm speaking with is inaudible, and then I created this app. Now I adjust volumes of any applications running on my PC while staying in the game, no more wasting time / taking risk minimizing lol.

Bonus: If you use Teamspeak, you can even set the volumes of each user in your channel independently!

All in all, you can have Windows' sound mixer on your smartphone. Just plug your charger and put your phone next to your keyboard!

Check out my website for more info! http://www.remoteappvolume.com
Or if you want, here is the google market link: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.alban.remoteappvolume

Don't hesitate to report any issues/opinions/improvements!

I hope you will find it useful! Happy mixing!
